Name: Early Bird Discount
Description: 5% off for bookings made 3 months in advance.

Name: Loyalty Discount
Description: 10% off for clients who have used our services for over 5 years.

Name: Family Discount
Description: 15% off on all services when booking for two or more family members.

Name: Special Funeral Discount
Description: 20% off for veterans and essential workers.
